# React + Tailwind CSS Project Instructions

This project is a React application built with Vite and styled with Tailwind CSS.

## Development Guidelines

- Use functional components with React hooks
- Follow React best practices for component structure
- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling
- Prefer TypeScript for type safety
- Use modern ES6+ JavaScript features
- Follow responsive design principles with Tailwind's responsive utilities

## Project Structure

- `/src` - Source code directory
- `/src/components` - Reusable React components  
- `/src/pages` - Page-level components
- `/src/styles` - Global styles and Tailwind configuration
- `/public` - Static assets

## Styling Guidelines

- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes primarily
- Create custom components when repeated patterns emerge
- Use Tailwind's design system for consistent spacing, colors, and typography
- Leverage Tailwind's responsive breakpoints for mobile-first design

## Development Workflow

- Run `npm run dev` to start the development server
- Use hot module replacement for fast development iteration
- Follow component-driven development practices
